product_name: Salomon Gecko Water Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Adapt to every environment, from wet, muddy trails to the shallow waters of a lake or river, with the modern protection and lightweight design of the Salomon Gecko Water Shoes. Breathable mesh and textile uppers keep debris out while allowing water to drain. Quicklace(TM) lacing system takes just a single pull for an exact fit; lace pocket hides lacing away. Breakaway lace system protects against tangling or snagging on water plants and other amphibious materials. Upper elastic collars offer easy entry. Neoprene spandex lining enhances a breathable, formfitting design. Injected EVA midsole provides all-day cushioning. Nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles offer the ideal blend of durability and traction on wet, slippery terrain. Closeout.
short_description: Adapt to every environment, from wet, muddy trails to the shallow waters of a lake or river, with the modern protection and lightweight design of the Salomon Gecko Water Shoes.
